Blockbuster 6 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap six untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Search your library for a legendary creature or planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If this spell is a blockbuster, search your library for two legendary creature and/or planeswalker cards instead.
